label:
This is an email notification that is sent to the subscribers of an event post if the event was updated.

You can insert the following dynamic values:

##Title## - Title of event
##NotifierFullName## - Name of the creator of the event
##FullName## - Name of the subscriber receiving the notification

template.subject: Event - updated
template.body: Dear ##FullName##, the event you subscribed to: ##ActivityTitle## has been updated, please check the event page for further information
